lead_paragraph: Canada won its fifth straight gold medal at the world junior championship, beating Sweden by 5-1 in the final in Ottawa. The streak tied Canada’s record of five consecutive titles in this tournament from 1993 to ’97. Canada’s 15th gold at the world juniors also matched Russia/Soviet Union for the most ever.
